objective: Aspiring MERN Stack Developer with a keen interest in crafting responsive and user-friendly web applications. Equipped with foundational skills in MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Seeking an opportunity to leverage expertise in the MERN stack to contribute to innovative projects and collaborate with like-minded professionals in a dynamic work environment. Passionate about continuous learning and growth in the field of web development.

education.studied: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (BSc CS)

achievements.desc: Participated in technical symposium at St.Joseph College, Trichy and awarded web development TECHX 2023 by holding third position.
